Developer.name: commands
Developer.help: List all commands and whether they're enabled/disabled.

Developer.name: source
Developer.help: Display source code of a command or file.

Moderation.name: clear
Moderation.help:
Allows moderators/admins/owners to remove up to 1000
channel messages.

Moderation.name: unlock
Moderation.help:
Allows moderators/admins/owners to allow messages to be sent
in a channel.

Moderation.name: slowmode
Moderation.help: Allows moderators/admins/owners to set a channel's slowmode delay.

Moderation.name: unwarn
Moderation.help: Allows moderators/admins/owners to remove warnings from a user.

Moderation.name: warn
Moderation.help: Allows moderators/admins/owners to give a warning to a user.

Moderation.name: kick
Moderation.help: Allows moderators/admins/owners to kick a user from a guild.

Moderation.name: warns
Moderation.help: Allows moderators/admins/owners to view their own or others warnings.

Moderation.name: mutes
Moderation.help:
Allows moderators/admins/owners to view currently
muted users and their mute duration.

Moderation.name: mute
Moderation.help: Allows moderators/admins/owners to mute a user.

Moderation.name: unmute
Moderation.help: Allows moderators/admins/owners to unmute a user.

Moderation.name: ban
Moderation.help: Allows admins/owners to ban a user from a guild.

Moderation.name: lock
Moderation.help:
Allows moderators/admins/owners to prevent messages from being
sent in a channel.

Moderation.name: unban
Moderation.help: Allows admins/owners to unban a user from a guild.

Help.name: support
Help.help: Invite link to the Synico support server.

Help.name: invite
Help.help: Invite links to invite me to your server.

Help.name: uptime
Help.help: Shows how long I've been online.

Jishaku.name: jishaku
Jishaku.help:
The Jishaku debug and diagnostic commands.

This command on its own gives a status brief.
All other functionality is within its subcommands.
